title: Varun Dhawan, Arjun Kapoor's reunion on the LFW ramp was one big party : Fashion, News - India Today
text:
Varun Dhawan, Arjun Kapoor's reunion on the LFW ramp was one big party Varun Dhawan and Arjun Kapoor upped the fun at Kunal Rawal's Lakme Fashion Week show. IndiaToday.in | Posted by Mini Dixit A + A - Varun and Arjun were an absolute delight on the Lakme Fashion Week stage. Photo: Yogen Shah 
This year's edition of Lakme Fashion Week has begun--so has the fun it usually guarantees. The first day of the highly-anticipated fashion event was marked by a plethora of shows that lived up to all their hype. 
From Urvashi Kaur to Amit Aggarwal and from Rina Singh to Antar Agni, the start of the fashion week was quite a winner. But there was one particular segment that edged above the others. 
Dressed in an off-white outfit complete with a nehru jacket, Varun Dhawan, turned showstopper for Kunal's show only to be joined by his close friend, Arjun Kapoor. Varun Dhawan flanked by Kunal Rawal and Arjun Kapoor. Photo: Yogen Shah 
The chemistry that hit headlines when Varun and Arjun first appeared on an episode of Koffee with Karan, was evident on the LFW stage too. The stars were also joined by Kunal, whose presence was more than appreciated by both, Varun and Arjun. 
In fact, being their usual, fun selves, Varun and Arjun picked Kunal up on their shoulders, much to the designer's surprise! Surprise, surprise! Photo: Yogen Shah 
Varun soon tweeted a picture from the show and said, "Friends. Walking for my friend @kunalrawalvibe with my friend @arjunk26. Who got pissed I picked him up but then." Friends. Walking for my friend @kunalrawalvibe with my friend @arjunk26 . Who got pissed I picked him up but then ???? pic.twitter.com/sMtlM7MOzr â€” VarunBadrinathdhawan (@Varun_dvn) February 1, 2017 To get the latest entertainment news and gossip, follow us on Twitter @Showbiz_IT and Like us on facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
